meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>cannon</kanji> is... wait for it... just a <vocabulary>cannon</vocabulary>. I guess all cannons are big, right? At least when you compare them to guns.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
